data.text:
Weather overview

Heidelberg (Germany) is a place with a mild climate. The day temperatures range from 5Â Â°CÂ (40Â Â°F) in January to 25Â Â°CÂ (78Â Â°F) in July. The highest night temperatures could be experienced in July with 14Â Â°CÂ (58Â Â°F), the lowest in January with -1Â Â°CÂ (30Â Â°F). The least rainy month in Heidelberg is September with its 9Â days of rain, the rainiest month is May, when it rains 13Â days.

January weather

The minimum of the day temperature can be noticed, with its value being 5Â Â°CÂ (40Â Â°F) in Heidelberg, and the night temperature reaches its minimum as well, the value of this measure is -1Â Â°CÂ (30Â Â°F). The number of rainy days descent's start could be observed, with its value being 11Â days, and the beginning of the descent of the rainfall amount could be noticed as well, with its value being 65Â mmÂ (2.56Â in). The maximum of the humidity is observable, its value is 90Â %.

February weather

The day temperature starts to rise, with its value being 6Â Â°CÂ (42Â Â°F) in Heidelberg. The rainfall amount continues to descent, with its value of 55Â mmÂ (2.17Â in), and the number of rainy days descents similarly to the previous month as well, with its value being 10Â days. The number of sun hours (without clouds) rise's start could be observed, with its value of 3Â hours.

March weather

The beginning of the rise of the number of rainy days could be noticed in Heidelberg, and the rainfall amount rise's start could be observed too. The day temperature rises similarly to the previous month, the value of this measure is 11Â Â°CÂ (52Â Â°F), while the night temperature rise's start could be observed in March. The rise of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be observed, with its value of 4Â hours. The wind speed reaches its maximum in this month.

April weather

The number of rainy days starts to descent, the value of this measure is 10Â days in Heidelberg, while the minimum of the rainfall amount can be noticed. The rise of the day temperature can be observed, the value of this measure is 16Â Â°CÂ (60Â Â°F), and the night temperature rises similarly to the previous month as well, with its value of 5Â Â°CÂ (40Â Â°F). The number of sun hours (without clouds) rises similarly to the previous month, its value is 5Â hours.

May weather

The rise of the day temperature can be observed, with its value being 20Â Â°CÂ (69Â Â°F) in Heidelberg, and the night temperature rises similarly to the previous month as well, its value is 9Â Â°CÂ (48Â Â°F). The maximum of the number of rainy days can be noticed, its value is 13Â days, while the rainfall amount starts to rise, with its value of 82Â mmÂ (3.24Â in). The tourist season slowly starts in May. The rise of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be observed, with its value of 7Â hours.

June weather

The tourist season is taking place in Heidelberg. The day temperature rises similarly to the previous month, its value is 23Â Â°CÂ (74Â Â°F), and the night temperature continues to rise too, its value is 12Â Â°CÂ (54Â Â°F). The beginning of the descent of the rainfall amount could be noticed, its value is 76Â mmÂ (2.99Â in). The number of sun hours (without clouds) rises similarly to the previous month, its value is 7Â hours. The day length is on its maximum, with its value of 16Â hours.

July weather

The tourist season continues this month in Heidelberg. The maximum of the rainfall amount is observable, with its value of 87Â mmÂ (3.43Â in). The night temperature is on its maximum, and the maximum of the day temperature is observable too, the value of this measure is 25Â Â°CÂ (78Â Â°F). The minimum of the humidity can be noticed, the value of this measure is 68Â %. The number of sun hours (without clouds) is on its maximum, with its value being 7Â hours.

August weather

There is pending tourist season this month in Heidelberg. The day temperature starts to descent, with its value being 25Â Â°CÂ (77Â Â°F). The descent of the number of rainy days can be observed, with its value being 11Â days, while the beginning of the descent of the rainfall amount could be noticed in August. The number of sun hours (without clouds) starts to descent, with its value being 7Â hours. The wind speed is on its minimum in August.

September weather

There is pending tourist season this month in Heidelberg. The minimum of the number of rainy days can be noticed in September. The day temperature descents similarly to the previous month, its value is 20Â Â°CÂ (69Â Â°F), while the night temperature starts to descent, with its value being 10Â Â°CÂ (51Â Â°F). The number of sun hours (without clouds) continues to descent, the value of this measure is 5Â hours.

October weather

The day temperature descents similarly to the previous month, with its value of 15Â Â°CÂ (59Â Â°F) in Heidelberg, and the night temperature descents similarly to the previous month as well, with its value being 7Â Â°CÂ (44Â Â°F). The number of rainy days starts to rise, with its value of 10Â days, and the beginning of the rise of the rainfall amount could be noticed as well. The number of sun hours (without clouds) continues to descent, the value of this measure is 4Â hours.

November weather

The night temperature continues to descent, with its value of 3Â Â°CÂ (37Â Â°F) in Heidelberg, and the day temperature descents similarly to the previous month as well, with its value of 9Â Â°CÂ (48Â Â°F). The descent of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be observed, its value is 2Â hours.

December weather

The number of rainy days starts to rise, its value is 12Â days in Heidelberg, and the rainfall amount starts to rise as well, with its value of 79Â mmÂ (3.10Â in). The day temperature descents similarly to the previous month, with its value being 5Â Â°CÂ (41Â Â°F), and the descent of the night temperature can be observed as well, its value is 0Â Â°CÂ (33Â Â°F). The minimum of the number of sun hours (without clouds) can be noticed, the value of this measure is 1Â hour. The day length reaches its minimum, with its value of 8Â hours.
